documents.document: One third of teens & young adults have successfully connected with health peers online, and 91% of them say the experience was helpful. https://t.co/O7nNHAl1Sh #PeerHealthAdvice
Half of app-using teens and young adults say they have used apps on 1-3 different health topics. 14% have tried apps on four or more health topics - @Hopelab + @WellBeingTrust
64% of teens and young adults in the U.S. say they have used mobile apps related to health, including for fitness, sleep, meditation, and medication reminders https://t.co/Sz9UHxWXHZ
